item.title: Nil - ()
item.description: The nil basic data type represents A single value, that represents absence of any other value.

item.title: Boolean
item.description: The boolean basic data type represents Boolean values; true, false.

item.title: Int
item.description: The int basic data type represents 64-bit signed integer values.

item.title: Float
item.description: The float basic data type represents 64-bit IEEE 754-2008 binary floating point numbers.

item.title: Float Literal With Exponent
item.description: Writing a float literal in scientific notation

item.title: Hello World API
item.description: Writing a Simple HTTP Hello World API

item.title: Copyright
item.description: Content This work including the content of pages, tips etc. is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License by Hasitha Aravinda. All Ballerina Example Source in this website are licensed under MIT License, unless explicitly mention in the top of the source code. Terms and Trademarks Ballerina Ballerina is an open-source programming language for the cloud that makes it easier to use, combine, and create network services - ballerina.

item.title: Thank you
item.description: When I built this website, I was inspired by multiple Hugo themes. I built this re-using and modifying some of the Hugo themes content. Thank you original authors for their hard work and for making this website simple, clean, and beautiful. Primary Theme - hugo-theme-docdock by vjeantet MIT license. Short Codes inspirations Tabs from hugo-theme-learn by matcornic - MIT license. hugo-book by alex-shpak - MIT license.
